revision.comment: Fixing [[WP:CHECKWIKI]] #16: unicode contol character (and other minor general edits caused by AWB), replaced: →
revision.text:
{{Infobox person |name=Jason Love |image=JasonLove3.jpg |caption=Jason Love at Brad Garrett's Comedy Club at MGM Grand, Las Vegas. April 2017. }}
'''Jason Love''' is an American comedian, musician, and author from [[Thousand Oaks, California]]. Love began his humor career in 2003 by syndicating a daily cartoon, ''Snapshots'', in collaboration with Serbian illustrator Vladimir Stankovski. ''Snapshots'' continues to be published by newspapers such as ''[[The Denver Post]]'' and ''[[Tampa Bay Times]]''.
From 2003 to 2007, Love worked as a humor columnist for the ''[[Ventura County Star]].''<ref>{{cite web|url=https://s3.amazonaws.com/gigsalad_media/j/jason_love_thousand_oaks/51fcb4a85926a.jpg|title= Former Star columnist Jason Love fills us in on his life as a touring comic » Ventura County Star<!-- Bot generated title -->|website=S3.amazonaws.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref>
From 2008 to present, Jason Love has worked full-time as a standup comedian, performing more than 200 times per year. He works routinely for cruise ships such as Royal Caribbean, Holland America, Norwegian, and Carnival.<ref name="dcptalent.com">https://www.dcptalent.com/act/jasonlove/</ref>
Jason does corporate events for companies such as Chevron, Farmers Insurance, and True Religion.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.GigMasters.com/comedian/jasonlove/feedback|title=Jason Love - Reviews|website=Gigmasters.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref>
Jason runs Love & Laughter, a non-profit organization that brings free standup comedy shows to the cancer support community.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.patreon.com/LoveLaughter|title=Jason Love is creating Love & Laughter, Live Comedy for Cancer Support Community - Patreon|website=Patreon.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.tucsonweekly.com/TheRange/archives/2018/04/18/laughing-stock-comedy-for-charity-brings-the-love|title=Laughing Stock: Comedy for Charity Brings the Love|first=Linda|last=Ray|website=Tucsonweekly.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref>
Jason appeared on the comedy special “Standup and Deliver” on Nuvo TV.<ref name="thecomicscomic.com">{{cite web|url=http://thecomicscomic.com/2014/01/28/nuvotvs-stand-up-and-deliver-goes-to-cabo-san-lucas/|title=NUVOtv’s Stand Up and Deliver goes to Cabo San Lucas|date=28 January 2014|website=Thecomicscomic.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref>
In 2017 he recorded for VidAngel a comedy special called Jokes On Me.<ref name="auto">{{cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1g1BBgFM1bA&t=19s|title=Jokes On Me|first=|last=Jason Love|date=19 July 2017|accessdate=8 May 2018|publisher=[[YouTube]]}}</ref>
He is represented by Don Casino Productions <ref name="dcptalent.com"/> and maintains a five-star rating at [[GigMasters]].<ref name="gigmasters.com">{{cite web|url=https://www.gigmasters.com/comedian/jasonlove|title=Jason Love - Comedian Thousand Oaks, CA|website=Gigmasters.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref>
Jason’s podcast “Labor of Love” was produced by Levity Entertainment Group.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/jason-love-labor-of-love/id804328493?mt=2|title=Jason Love: Labor Of Love by Jason Love on Apple Podcasts|website=Apple Podcasts|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref>
His comedy can be heard daily on Pandora Radio.<ref name="pandora.com">{{cite web|url=http://blog.pandora.com/from-the-artists/don-friesen-and-jason-love/|title=From the Working Comedian – Interview with Don Friesen and Jason Love|website=Blog.pandora.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref>
==Standup comedy== Known for his “clean style of comedy and quirky spirit",<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.tucsonweekly.com/TheRange/archives/2017/08/31/laughing-stock-good-clean-fun|title=Laughing Stock: Good, Clean Fun|first=Linda|last=Ray|website=Tucsonweekly.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref> Jason headlines regularly at comedy clubs<ref name="gigmasters.com"/> while producing his own shows at venues such as the San Diego County Fair and iPic Theater across the nation.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k41QXaQTpG4|title=Trailer for Live Comedy at Studio Movie Grill|first=|last=Jason Love|date=10 March 2018|accessdate=8 May 2018|publisher=[[YouTube]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.jasonlove.eventbrite.com|title=Jason Love|website=Eventbrite|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref> The ''VC Reporter'' describes, "Jason Love: A lean, clean, jokin’ machine."<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.vcreporter.com/2018/01/creative-types-jason-love-a-lean-clean-jokin-machine/|title=CREATIVE TYPES - Jason Love: A lean, clean, jokin’ machine|date=4 January 2018|website=Vcreporter.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref>
===Television=== *HBO (played a horse race expert on HBO’s “Luck” with Dustin Hoffman) *Last Comic Standing (NBC) *Today’s Riff on TBS <ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sbkWIjV_mAY|title=Jason Love on TBS|first=|last=Jason Love|date=10 September 2017|accessdate=8 May 2018|publisher=[[YouTube]]}}</ref> *Standup and Deliver on Nuvo TV <ref name="thecomicscomic.com"/> *Recorded a one-hour special for Dry Bar Comedy produced by VidAngel.<ref name="auto"/> *Host of the video series “Canned” produced by Studio 805.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://archive.vcstar.com/news/after-a-dusty-sb-trail-trip-studio-805-heads-in-new-directions-ep-373599875-352544981.html/|title=After a dusty S.B. trail trip, Studio 805 heads in new directions|website=Archive.vcstar.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref> *Hosted for the Ventura County Star a number of humorous videos produced by Anthony Plascencia.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.questia.com/magazine/1G1-167269404/syndicates-getting-the-picture-with-video-columns|title="Syndicates: Getting the Picture with Video Columns" by Astor, Dave - Editor & Publisher, August 1, 2007 - Online Research Library: Questia|website=Questia.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref>
===Radio=== Love has appeared on ''[[The Bob & Tom Show]]'' radio program.
===Cruise lines=== *Royal Caribbean *Celebrity *Norwegian *Carnival *Holland America
===Casinos and Clubs===
*Toured with Craig Shoemaker, Bryan Callen, and Don Friesen. *Brad Garrett’s *Improv *Laugh Factory *Stardome *Caroline’s on Broadway *Punchline *Zanies *Comedy Store *Balboa Theatre *Hermosa Comedy & Magic *Standup Live *Parlor Live
===Internet=== *Podcast, Labor of Love *Pandora Radio <ref name="pandora.com"/>
===Armed Forces Entertainment=== Jason Love performed in Afghanistan for the troops.
==Columnist and cartoonist== Love began his humor career in 2003 by syndicating a daily cartoon, Snapshots, in collaboration with Serbian illustrator Vladimir Stankovski. Snapshots continues to be published by newspapers such as The Denver Post and Tampa Bay Times.
From 2003 to 2007, Love worked as a humor columnist for the Ventura County Star.
==Discography== ''Metro Man'' <ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.amazon.com/Jason-Love-Metro-Combo-Pack/dp/B005VST6QK|title=Jason Love: Metro Man|date=25 October 2011|website=Amazon.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref>
Jokes On Me by VidAngel.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1g1BBgFM1bA|title=Jokes On Me|author=Jason Love|date=19 July 2017|accessdate=8 May 2018|publisher=[[YouTube]]}}</ref>
==Publications== ''Snapshots: The Big Picture'' ({{ISBN|978-1419685163}}) <ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.amazon.com/Snapshots-Big-Picture-Jason-Love/dp/1419685163|title=Snapshots: The Big Picture|first=Jason|last=Love|date=10 January 2008|publisher=BookSurge Publishing|accessdate=8 May 2018|via=Amazon}}</ref>
''So It Goes: Stories for People Who Laugh'' ({{ISBN|978-1439260999}}) <ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.amazon.com/So-Goes-Stories-People-Laugh/dp/1439260990|title=So it Goes: Stories for People Who Laugh|first1=Jason|last1=Love|first2=Ernie|last2=Cavazos|editor-first=Charlie|editor-last=Myers|date=8 January 2010|publisher=BookSurge Publishing|accessdate=8 May 2018|via=Amazon}}</ref>
Quotes from Jason Love’s standup act can be found in Reader’s Digest <ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.bizedex.com/jl/readers-digest.jpg|format=JPG|title=Reader's Digest cover|website=Bizedex.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref> as well as the books Comedy Thesaurus<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.bizedex.com/jl/comedy-thesaurus.jpg|format=JPG|title=Comedy Thesaurus cover|website=Bizedex.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref> and Squeaky Clean Comedy.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.bizedex.com/jl/squeaky-clean-comedy.jpg|format=JPG|title=Squeaky Clean cover|website=Bizedex.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref>
==Awards== 2006: Second Place in Humor for circulations over 100K from The National Society of Newspaper Columnists.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.columnists.com/awards/column-contest-winners/|title=Column Contest Winners, Going Way Back|date=16 July 2015|website=Columnists.com|accessdate=8 May 2018}}</ref>
Love was a finalist at the Cabo Comedy Festival and at the World Series of Comedy in Vegas.
==References== {{Reflist}}
==External links== *{{official website|http://www.jasonlove.com/}} * [http://www.snapshots.net Snapshots Cartoons] * [https://www.youtube.com/user/jasonjlove Jason Love's YouTube Channel] * IMDb: [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm4765543/bio Jason Love Biography] * [http://www.bizedex.com/jl/timeout-ventura-county.jpg Ventura County Star Newspaper] * [https://dcptalent.com/act/jasonlove/ Don Casino Agency] * [https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/jason-love-labor-of-love/id804328493?mt=2 Labor of Love Podcast] * [https://www.gigmasters.com/comedian/jasonlove Gigmasters.com entry]
